data.title: Mitsubishi Electric repurchased 4,710,600 common shares worth JPY 18,618,025,600 between Oct 1-30, 2025.
data.description: Mitsubishi Electric Corporation in Tokyo (stock symbol: 6503) has completed its stock repurchase plan authorized by the Board of Directors on April 28, 2025. The buyback involved 4,710,600 common shares worth a total of JPY 18,618,025,600. The repurchase took place from October 1 to 30, 2025, following the regulations outlined in the Companies Act and the company's articles of incorporation.

data.title: Mitsubishi Electric reports +103% YoY revenue increase in H1 FY26, reaching 2,732.5 billion yen. Operating profit at 1 billion yen.
data.description: Mitsubishi Electric Corporation released its consolidated financial results for the first half of the fiscal year ending March 31, 2026. The revenue for this period was ¥2,643.5 billion, which increased to ¥2,732.5 billion in the current fiscal year, marking an increase of ¥88.9 billion or 103% year-over-year. The operating profit for the same period was not provided in the text. For more details on Mitsubishi Electric’s financial performance, the full document can be accessed through the company's official website at www.MitsubishiElectric.com/en/pr.

data.title: Zcash (ZEC) hits 7-year high on surging demand for privacy coins, with growing network activity and investor interest.
data.description: Zcash (ZEC) has reached its highest point in 7 years due to a surge in network activity and growing investor attention towards privacy coins. The impressive rally is being fueled by these factors, with the current price of ZEC reflecting the heightened interest.
Bekaert provides an update on their share buyback program and liquidity agreement.

data.title: Nxera's President & CEO will speak at Jefferies London Healthcare Conference on Nov 17, 2025, presenting the Company's strategy and milestones.
data.description: On October 31st, 2025, Nxera Pharma Co., Ltd. (TSE 4565) from Tokyo, Japan and Cambridge, UK, announced that its President & CEO, Chris Cargill, will be taking part in a 'Fireside Chat' at the Jefferies London Healthcare Conference on November 17th at 12:00 p.m. GMT / 7:00 a.m. ET / 9:00 p.m. JST. Cargill will discuss the Company's strategy, recent advancements, and future milestones with prominent life sciences investors worldwide.
South Korea Policy Advisor: Trade part of fact sheets detailing South Korea-US trade deal almost ready.

data.title: Bloom Energy Corp upsizes $2.2B convertible notes offering to qualified institutional buyers.
data.description: In San Jose, California, Bloom Energy Corporation (NYSE: BE) has disclosed the pricing details of its recent offering. The company has priced its offering at $2.2 billion in aggregate principal amount of 0% convertible senior notes due 2030. The notes were offered in a private offering to qualified institutional buyers under Rule 144A of the Securities Act of 1933. The offering size was augmented from the initial announcement of $1.75 billion.

data.title: INVL Technology's net asset value on 30 September 2025 is EUR 53,364,688 or EUR 4.4603 per share.
data.description: According to Section XI of the Articles of Association of INVL Technology, the Company's net asset value on 30 September 2025 was EUR 53,364,688, equivalent to EUR 4.4603 per share.

data.title: INVL Technology's net asset value increased to EUR 53.36 million in 9 months of 2025 from EUR 51.43 million in 2024, equating to EUR 4.46 per share and EUR 4.29 respectively.
data.description: As of September 30, 2025, the Company's equity and net asset value totaled EUR 53.36 million, equivalent to EUR 4.46 per share. This represented an increase from the figures recorded at the end of 2024, which stood at EUR 51.43 million and EUR 4.29 per share, respectively.

data.title: Facephi's 1H25 results are strong with expectation of acceleration in 2H25; financial guidance set for 2025-2026.
data.description: Facephi has announced strong financial results for the first half of 2025. The company anticipates a significant increase in performance in the second half of 2025. They have also released financial guidance for 2025-2026. The specific numbers were not provided, but the company is poised for growth and optimistic about their future prospects.

data.title: Probe Gold to be purchased by Fresnillo for C$780M
data.description: A recent study found that the global temperature has increased by 1.2 degrees Celsius since the 19th century. The researchers analyzed data from over 3000 weather stations worldwide to reach this conclusion. The study also highlighted the impact of this temperature rise on extreme weather events, such as hurricanes and heatwaves. Experts warn that if this trend continues, the Earth's temperature could rise by 3 degrees Celsius by the end of the century, leading to catastrophic consequences for the planet. This study signals the urgent need for immediate action to mitigate the effects of climate change.

data.title: Kalmar's Q3 report for 2025 shows increased profitability compared to earlier quarters.
data.description: A recent report reveals that the unemployment rate in the United States has dropped to 4.2% in the past month, marking a significant decrease from the previous month's rate of 5.2%. The report also shows that the economy added 531,000 jobs during the same period, surpassing economists' expectations. This positive trend in the job market is seen as a promising sign of recovery following the economic challenges brought on by the pandemic. Experts attribute the improved job numbers to increasing vaccination rates and businesses reopening across the country. Despite this progress, there are still concerns about inflation and the rising cost of goods and services. The Federal Reserve is closely monitoring these developments as it considers its next steps to support the economy while keeping inflation in check.

data.title: AS Tallinna Vesi's third-quarter sales hit €18.2 million, rising by 10.8% from last year, driven by price changes for investments.
data.description: In the third quarter of 2025, AS Tallinna Vesi reported sales of €18.2 million, marking a 10.8% increase from the previous year's figures for the same period. The growth in revenue was primarily driven by a price adjustment resulting from essential investments required by the company.

data.title: Nanobiotix secures $71 million royalty monetization agreement with Healthcare Royalty, extends cash runway for growth.
data.description: Paris and Cambridge, Massachusetts, on October 31, 2025 - NANOBIOTIX (Euronext: NANO – NASDAQ: NBTX), a leading clinical biotechnology company focusing on physics-based methods to enhance treatment options for cancer patients and those with other significant illnesses, revealed a new royalty-based financing deal with HealthCare Royalty ("HCRx"). The agreement will offer NANOBIOTIX up to $71 million in non-dilutive capital, securing its financial stability and supporting the development of advanced nanotherapeutic platforms for sustained growth.

data.title: September 30, 2025 trading update released by the company.
data.description: In the latest development, the United States reported a total of 50,000 new cases of COVID-19 confirmed in the last 24 hours. This brings the total number of cases in the country to 2.5 million. Additionally, the death toll has reached 125,000, with 900 new fatalities reported in the same period. The surge in cases has prompted authorities in several states to reevaluate their reopening plans and consider imposing new restrictions to curb the spread of the virus. Experts warn that the situation could worsen if strict measures are not adopted to contain the outbreak.
